Posts.EditableText: I'm pleased to announce the release of my first game, "spondre". I hope this will be the first of many. I'm looking forward to seeing what people think about this. And much thanks to my beta testers (you can see their names in the About section). All comments welcome! The game can be found here: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... iq/spondre (On some browsers, the game won't progress past the title screen. If you have that problem, you can try the "no title screen" version here: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... tle-screen)
